Classes in vwr.project.services.graphics used by vwr.project.services.graphics
DrawManager
          Draw Manager initializes the GL parameters, then it uses lists of sprites, elements, and text things that it draws once a frame, then clears* the lists.
Element
          Element is an abstract class that encompasses all elements.
PointColor
          Points to be used by elements.
